steps.title: Give them a good laugh with a hilarious 23rd birthday greeting.
steps.content: Give them a good laugh with a hilarious 23rd birthday greeting. A funny birthday greeting can help them have a great day and bring you closer together. steps.title: Your 23rd birthday marks the beginning of your Jordan year.
steps.content: Your 23rd birthday marks the beginning of your Jordan year. Itâ€™s not a milestone birthday like 21 or 25, but that doesnâ€™t mean your 23rd birthday isnâ€™t special. In fact, some people call it the Jordan year and consider it your best year ever! [4] X Research source â€œJordan yearâ€ refers to the number legendary baller Michael Jordan wore (23) when he played for the Chicago Bulls. So, celebrate your 23rd birthday and start living your best life!

steps.title: Do a little recon by asking the people close to them what they might like.
steps.content: Do a little recon by asking the people close to them what they might like. According to Ratson, the point of a giftâ€”or anything else you doâ€”is to make them feel special on their birthday. One way to do that is to get them a gift that feels really personal and special. Talking with their family members or close friends can help you get some great ideas for birthday presents. Give them an experiential gift like going to see their favorite band play live or taking them to an amusement park. Or do something new that theyâ€™ve been wanting to try, like rock climbing or bungee jumping.

steps.title: Try asking them what they want.
steps.content: Try asking them what they want. Ratson tells us that the best way to celebrate someoneâ€™s birthday is to do something they love. In the end, the goal is to get them a gift that will make them happy. The easiest way to find that out is to just ask. Such a direct approach means your gift wonâ€™t be a surprise, but that doesnâ€™t make it any less meaningful or special.

steps.title: Remember that it really is the thought that counts.
steps.content: Remember that it really is the thought that counts. Ratson feels â€œthe effort, the ideas, the intention, the energy, and the uniqueness of [gifts] are alwaysâ€¦a guideline to make something for the birthday.â€ He adds, â€œThe creation and the effort that [you] put inâ€¦symbolizes the love.â€ When you choose a birthday gift, keep in mind that many families have different customs when it comes to gift giving. [5] X Research source For example, some families prefer to give and receive handmade gifts, like a photo book or cookies. Others might give gag gifts, like socks that look like dog paws or a night light for the toilet.
